snippet: Hundreds of pages of internal Takata documents and emails examined by The New York Times reveal new details about how economic pressures helped guide the company’s handling of its airbag defect, which has been linked to at least 11 deaths and more than 100 injuries.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of pages of internal Takata documents and emails examined by The New York Times reveal new details about how economic pressures helped guide the company’s handling of its airbag defect, which has been linked to at least 11 deaths and more than 100 injuries.

headline.main: Takata Email: ‘It’s All About the Cost’
